cast.overview: Chickie wants to support his friends fighting in Vietnam, so he does something wild—personally bring them American beer. What starts as a well-meaning journey quickly changes Chickie’s life and perspective. Based on a true story.
cast.title: The Greatest Beer Run Ever

cast.overview: A group of covert CIA operatives trailing a potential new energy source are double-crossed by corrupt agent Morgan, who causes a helicopter crash in remote South Africa. The sole survivor, suffering severe amnesia, is nursed to recovery by a kindly native tribe who call him "Whoami" after the question he keeps asking. With the help of a mysterious reporter Christine, Whoami pieces together his past and tracks the turncoat agent and his criminal cohorts.
cast.title: Who Am I?

details.biography: Ron Smoorenburg (born 30 April 1974) is a Dutch martial artist and actor. He is best known for the end fight in Jackie Chan’s “Who am I?”, 1998. Ron worked with the best action stars and directors known today and developed himself in the last 20 years as an actor with a versatile and experienced action background. In “Warriors Gate” 2016 (Luc Besson), Ron plays one of the main heroes: “The Black Knight”.
details.name: Ron Smoorenburg
